text: Norrporten Arena is a sports ground in the town of Sundsvall in Sweden. It was opened as Sundsvalls idrottspark on 6 August 1903 as. It is currently used mostly for association football games. It is the home ground for GIF Sundsvall. ==References== ==Other websites== * Norrporten Arena at gifsundsvall.se Category:1903 establishments in Sweden Category:Stadiums in Sweden Category:Football stadiums in Sweden Category:Sundsvall
title: Norrporten Arena
